mapper.select: select expense_id, usagePlace, edate from expense_TABLE order by expense_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into expense_TABLE(expense_id, eempno, usagePlace) values (expense_TABLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{eempno}, #{usagePlace})
mapper.select: select expense_id, usagePlace, quantity, edate from expense_TABLE where expense_id=#{expense_id}
mapper.update: update expense_TABLE set usagePlace=#{usagePlace} where expense_id=#{expense_id}
